content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings, Maryam. While I appreciate your interest in our apartment in Munich, let me emphasize that as the landlord, I'm looking to secure the highest possible price for the rental. However, in this negotiation, we'll only focus on the price; other terms and conditions won't be discussed at this time. Now, if you have an initial offer in mind, please share it with me. If we can reach an agreement, I'll say 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' Otherwise, we'll terminate the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello Maryam, I understand your interest in renting my apartment. I am willing to offer you the apartment for 1000 Euros a month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the proposed price is significantly lower than my expectations. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
